name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Beat
storyline: Rolling all the way from Tokyo-to, this enigmatic and funky renegade graffiti artist is ready to glide, grind and roll as he joins the monkey gang’s search for the Legendary Banana.
summary:
Over the Hood, Through the Streets - Beat from Jet Set Radio Joins the Rumble!

Roll with Beat in either Adventure Mode or Battle Mode!
Pick up Spray Paint Cans instead of Bananas as you skate your way through each stage.
